import css from './CurrencyConverter.module.css'; import give_arrow from '../images/give_arrow.png'; import get_arrow from '../images/get_arrow.png'; import Bitcoin from '../images/Bitcoin.png'; import Ethereum from '../images/Ethereum.png'; import USDT from '../images/USDT.png'; import USD from '../images/USD.png'; import EUR from '../images/EUR.png'; import ZL from '../images/zl.png'; function onBitcoinClick(event) { event.preventDefault(); fetch('https://api.binance.com/api/v3/trades?symbol=BTCUSDT').then(r => r.json().then(j => console.log(parseFloat(j.price).toFixed(2))) ); } export default function CurrencyConverter() { return (
ОТДАЁТЕ:

  • Bitcoin

  • Ethereum

  • USDT TRC20

  • USDT ERC20

ПОЛУЧАЕТЕ:

  • USD

  • EUR

  • PLN

); }
